StructuredXMLResume.Objective: To be an accomplished professional who strives for excellence at every step of life with a focus on innovation and value addition. Being a techie and also handling a team efficiently. My moto to work as a lead like help others to unblock their problem with an optimized and easy way. And also keep on working with code to as an individual contributor. Higher Secondary Uluberia high School WBCHSE 2006 68.30 Madhyamik Pariksha Uluberia high School WBBSE 2004 80.01

PositionHistory.Description:
1. Apiture DevPortal Team Size 14 Details: Apiture Devportal is an open banking API project. Where developers can create their own SDK to set up any application to use OPEN banking APIs. It is complete banking domain solution. We are providing complete end to end solution for the OPEN API Solution for developers. User can request for multiple level API key and access token for multiple environment. It is completely secured and highly scalable. Complete agile process maintained in 3 weeks sprint
Technologies used:- NodeJs 11.0.0, REST full web services, AngularJS 7, Jekyll template engine. Complete AWS services, cognito,DynamoDB, SSM, SNS, Route 53, Lambda.
My Role:- I am working as Enterprise Architect to work on the end to end solution DFD. And also the process I am handling from the scratch. I initially started this from scratch. Leading a team of 14 in-terms of technical guidance and also engaging myself to take care the delivery.
It is a higher version of stripe.com what we are building now. We have version specific API documentation.
URL:- production.developer.apiture.com
1. Individual Store View (ISV) , Team Size 10 Details: Individual Store View (ISV) provides an ability to view any Sears / Kmart store details related to their demographics, physical location, real estate information, competitors, financial performance, BU performance and member performance. Technologies used:- node 6.5.4,REST full web services angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB agile process
1. Amazon Alexa ECHO integration With IBM Watson chatBOT, team size 2. Details: Amazon echo device used with node to create a voice automated application for banking front desk as well as some specific department where customer care is integrated as BOT. We integrated IBM Watson chatBOT. Admin can train them as per requirement also. Technologies Used: NodeJS, IBM Watson Service, Amazon Echo device, Angular2
1. IMV analytics web app for 153M active customers individual record and also we are working on the behaviour of individual customer and predict the future purchases of any individual customer. Team size 10 working as Technical Lead also IC. Details: as its a analytics platform we are working with we need to handle huge amount of data like 1tb of data we need to process. So we are using Google cloud big query as a big data platform. Technologies used:- node 6.5.4, angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB
1. MDE is a analytics platform where we segregate 153M active customers by some predefined filters provided by business unit heads. Team size 10 working as Technical Lead also IC. Details: as its a analytics platform we are working with we need to handle huge amount of data like 1tb of data we need to process. So we are using Google cloud big query as a big data platform. Technologies used:- node 6.5.4, angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB
1. CSquire Team Size 6. Mean Stack Developer Details: CSQUIRE is a business-to-business networking site focused on creating a knowledge sharing community of business software users (ERP, Accounting, Marketing Automation etc.) and software professionals consultants, consulting organizations and power users. The CSQUIRE community is based on profiles of individuals who associate themselves with companies and products. Technologies Used: NodeJS,Jade Template, JavaScript, Stripe Payment Gateway, MongoDB, BootStrap, Agile Development,Redis,Strompath
1. Ubee Chat Team Size 17 Team Lead Node.Js, AngularJs,RethinkDB,Agile Development,MongoDB Details:It's a chat application with some advanced options for users than whatsapp and hike. Multiple new options are there. We are using nodeJS with rethinkDB database in backend for the faster response from server to make the chat application faster. We made this as a chat module. We can call this chat functionality like plug and play. Also have the options to modify the theme and also the restrictions in the chat application
1. Cisco Collaborative Knowledge team size 6 Mean Stack Developer Node.JS , elasticsearch,express, mongoDB,Agile Development, Kafka Details:This is a tutorial application. Any user can enroll for a course can take a course can ask for a specialist instructor in this application. Have question answer section can clear any doubt in group or direct to sepecialist.We are using elasticsearch a primary DB and mongoDB as a backup DB. Used kafka and storm just not to lose any data if server is down.
Using loadbalancer to handle heavy request load.
AngularJS Projects: Project name Technology Used and Details 1. Codethon Details: Its a quiz contest project with a proper admin panel for a Investment banking Wells Fargo. Its a angular JS mobile app where user can answer mcq kind of questions which is generated randomly to the user after submitting answeres all goes to admin panel and amin can choose a winner and after selection user will get a sms and mail notification.
Technologies Used: Angular JS,NodeJS Agile Development, twilio, mandrill,
1. Ubee Chat Node.Js, AngularJs,RethinkDB,Agile Development,MongoDB Details:It's a chat application with some advanced options for users than whatsapp and hike. Multiple new options are there. We are using nodeJS with rethinkDB database in backend for the faster response from server to make the chat application faster. We made this as a chat module. We can call this chat functionality like plug and play. Also have the options to modify the theme and also the restrictions in the chat application
Phonegap Projects Details:
Project Name Technology used Platform Link / Details 1. Live Cricket Phonegap, HTML 5. Data received through API. Current Cricket Score Update. Android 2.2 to latest It's a simple cricket score update mobile application for android 1. Coca-Cola India (Coke-cci) Phonegap, HTML 5, • Data access DB file in device memory. Accessing that DB file directly through my application. • Bluetooth plugin to connect a printable Bluetooth device and print invoices. • SQLite Plugin to access a DB file which is within the application.
Android 2.2 to latest
This application like maintaining the inventory through a application instead of a notebook in hand. App can directly connect with a Bluetooth printer and able to produce invoice after delivery.
1. Coke MD Phonegap, HTML 5, • Data access -> From xml response. • Bluetooth plugin to connect a printable Bluetooth device and print invoices. SQLite Plugin to access a DB file which is within the application.
Android 2.2 to latest
This application like maintaining the inventory through a application instead of a notebook in hand. App can directly connect with a Bluetooth printer and able to produce invoice after delivery. This application has offline mode also
1. StockMD Phonegap, HTML 5, • Data access -> From http response. • Square Card Reader
Android 2.2 to latest and iPad version
This is like online clinic and dispensary application
1. Ubee Chat Mobile app Phonegap 2.9.0 • HTML5 • Jquery Mobile • Node.Js + RethinkDB • Jquery • Bluetooth plugin • Transition plugin • txt file creation and upload in server
Android 2.3 to latest + IOS

• Mysql database management • MongoDB • Sqlite database creation • Rethink DB • ElasticSearch • DynamoDB
AWS Services • Cognito • SSM • DynamoDB • Lambda • Route 53 • SNS

Enterprise Architect Handling FullStack Developement
Ranjoy Ghosh Hyderabad IT Ex.: 8 years Ph: - 9748158413(M); NodeJS Ex.: 6.5 years Full Stack Development Experience: 6 Years AngularJS Ex.: 4 Years Email: - ranjoy.ghosh88@gmail.com Notice period 90 days Skype:- ranjoy.ghosh88
Objective: To be an accomplished professional who strives for excellence at every step of life with a focus on innovation and value addition. Being a techie and also handling a team efficiently. sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Ranjoy Ghosh's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Big Data) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Internal Audit). Ranjoy Ghosh has 9 years of work experience, with several years tenure in management, including a low-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Starting on 9/8/2016, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years: Title: Technical Lead for Sears Holdings Corporation Starting on 7/8/2014, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 9 months: Title: Software Developer(Team Lead) for Business On Top

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:416;] We found no EDUCATION HISTORY section header for the candidate, but we calculated where we thought EDUCATION HISTORY was located in the resume. The education history section should have a header such as 'Education' before listing the content.
[Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.
[Sovren:323;OBJECTIVE] The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: OBJECTIVE (2 occurrences). Each section type should only appear once in a resume.

[Sovren:325;1,2] The following sections do not have a header: Section with index 1 (of type: EDUCATION), Section with index 2 (of type: OBJECTIVE). Every section should have a header directly above the content associated with it.
[Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
[Sovren:221;POS-12,POS-13,POS-8,POS-9,POS-11,POS-10] We could not find a job title for: POS-12, POS-13, POS-8, POS-9, POS-11, POS-10. Every position in a resume should have a job title.
[Sovren:222;POS-7] No employer name was found for: POS-7. Every position in a resume should have an employer name.

[Sovren:151;0] The following section does not have the header on a separate line: 'Objective:'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = US; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
